caption.p: Study area corresponding to the historical centre of the city of Bologna. ( A) Map of 1891 (from Biblioteca Archiginnasio Bologna, BCABO, GDS, Raccolta piante e vedute della città di Bologna, Cartella 8, n.79, ID 143); ( B) 2018 satellite image downloaded from Google Maps ( www.google.com/maps) and graphically elaborated with the ArcMap programme (version 10.1, ESRI, www.esri.com) by M. Salinitro on the basis of the dataset “Salinitro et al. 2018” (Supplementary Table S1). HBA, historical building area (blue); NBA, new building area (green); OCC, old city centre (red).
